attributes.action: make the inquiry into Iraq War PUBLIC, not to hold it behind closed doors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Simply to hold a public, not private, inquiry into the Iraq war. The British and Iraqi people deserve to know the truth, not part of it. No more secrecy, no more lies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
